title: Lady Gaga Laughs Off Frightening Stage Fall With Fan
text:
Lady Gaga fell off the stage after being picked up by a fan during the return of her “Enigma” residency in Las Vegas on Thursday night, per multiple news organizations.

Footage filmed from various angles show how the unidentified fan picked up the pop star and bounced her around. He then misstepped and they plummeted off the platform to gasps from the audience inside Park MGM’s Park Theater.

Check out the clips here:

Me: He would never let me down



Him: pic.twitter.com/DbCBJ5dCeX — Papi Al (@ThePapiAl) October 18, 2019

why did the spotlight follow them i'm crying 😭 pic.twitter.com/4cuxovvkHr — Lady Gaga Facts (@LGMonsterFacts) October 18, 2019

Gaga is yet to comment on the incident on social media.

But, according to fan accounts on Twitter that chronicle her career, she returned to the stage soon after and invited the fan to join her.

In another video, Gaga joked about them loving each other “so much we fall off the damn stage.” “You know what we did?” she added. “We fell into each other’s arms. We’re like Rose and Jack in the Titanic.”

Check out that video here:

Gaga is the kindest, most adorable human being on earth. She was nothing but loving to that fan 🥺 "We're like Rose and Jack in the Titanic" pic.twitter.com/EKpGxG2NKH — Lady Gaga Facts (@LGMonsterFacts) October 18, 2019
description: "We fell into each other’s arms," the pop star later joked about the tumble during her "Enigma" residency in Las Vegas.
